Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Shenzhen, Grand Soluxe Zhongyou Hotel Shenzhen is close to Shenzhen University and Xin'an Nantou Ancient City. This hotel is within close proximity of Zhongshan Park and Shekou Ferry Terminal.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 224 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a health club and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Shenzhen? This hotel has 2928 square feet (272 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and a meeting room. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge (available on request), and limited parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

In the heart of Shenzhen, Grand Soluxe Zhongyou Hotel Shenzhen is close to Shenzhen University and Xin'an Nantou Ancient City. This hotel is within close proximity of Zhongshan Park and Shekou Ferry Terminal.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Shenzhen University - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Xin'an Nantou Ancient City - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Zhongshan Park - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Shekou Ferry Terminal - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Chiwan Tin Hau Temple - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Window of the World - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Tomb of the Young Song Emperor - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
He Xiangning Art Museum - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Happy Valley - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Splendid China Folk Village - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Chinese Overseas City - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Mangrove Seashore Ecological Park - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Shenzhen Polytechnic - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Shenzhen International Garden and Flower Expo Park - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Shenzhen Safari Park - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Soluxe Zhongyou Hotel Shenzhen is Shenzhen (SZX-Shenzhen Intl.) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
